summary: AN ORDINANCE related to the City Light Department and a Utility Relocation Agreement with the City of Burien for the relocation and undergrounding of utility infrastructure for the 1st Avenue South Improvements -- Phase 2 project in Burien; approving the release, indemnification and hold harmless provision in accordance with Section 8.2 of the Utility Relocation Agreement, and ratifying and confirming certain prior acts.
